alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Snyder; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 5:17PM EDT until March 31 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Columbia County in central Pennsylvania... Southern Montour County in central Pennsylvania... Central Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Snyder County in central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Union County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 517 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Selinsgrove, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bloomsburg, Sunbury, Shamokin, Selinsgrove, Danville, Northumberland, Winfield, Elysburg, Fairview-Ferndale, Riverside, Trevorton and Shamokin Dam. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Limestoneville and Bloomsburg-Light Street exits, specifically from mile markers 222 to 235. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
